page.title: 09JANE ROSSINGTON - TV STAR
page.content: I live with my husband David and my two children Sorrel and Harry at Wall Hall. We have lived here very happily for eight years and feel that we have returned to our roots, as my husband was born in Lichfield and I was brought up nearby. I travel to Birmingham every day, initially to take my children to school and to go on to work at Central TV Studios where I act in a soap opera "Crossroads". It is with a great sense of relief that I drive home in the evening away from the city and back to our small community. I can see the church clock from our house in the centre of the village and enjoy hearing its chime and our view the other way is over open farm land. The children feel safe to play all around the village and meet their friends. I feel very happy and content living here.
